Articles.Content: Is there a key to bring up the menu to adjust the gear? Or is it not working at all now. The only option I see when I right click the gear is for the alignment guide.
If you're talking about Baha's mod, it's incompatible with 1.1 & he's too busy to fix it.
Damn that's the one any recommended substitutes?
No substitutes I'm afraid. Much like Kerbal Foundries, its flubberknucked for the time being.

The source for the plugin is readily available, unfortunately the model source is not, and I fear wheels have changed enough that it'd be needed. Not having made any wheels I can't say that for sure, mind.
